proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is losing 200 hours annually on manual proposals. This is where it drains.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, Shida spends hours crafting each proposal. With our system, generate a complete proposal in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are the ongoing losses Shida faces without our system.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Shida spends 50 hours a month on proposals. That's time not spent on design projects or acquiring new clients.

problems.title: Lost Revenue
problems.description: Every delayed proposal costs potential revenue. If a client is lost every month, that's $10,000 yearly Shida cannot recover.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manually created proposals risk inconsistency. Each inconsistency weakens Shida's professional image, costing credibility.

problems.title: Inefficient Resource Use
problems.description: Shida's team of four is overextended. Every hour on proposals is an hour not spent on client work, leading to $5,000 in lost productivity annually.

problems.title: Client Frustration
problems.description: Slow response times frustrate clients. For every delayed proposal, client satisfaction drops, risking future work worth thousands.

problems.title: Competitive Disadvantage
problems.description: Manual proposals mean slower turnaround. Competitors respond faster, capturing opportunities Shida could lose, worth $15,000 annually.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all these inefficiencies with speed and precision.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system creates them in under 60 seconds, freeing up valuable time.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual proposals risk inconsistency. Our system ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with Shida's brand.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Experience
solutions.description: Clients wait for proposals. Now, they receive them almost instantly, boosting satisfaction and loyalty.

solutions.title: Resource Optimization
solutions.description: Shida's team is bogged down by proposal work. Our system frees them to focus on design and growth.

solutions.title: Competitive Edge
solutions.description: Competitors may outpace manual processes. With our AI, Shida leads with rapid responses, winning more deals.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Brand with Shida's Expert Design Solutions
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We will craft a tailored design strategy that enhances brand visibility and drives customer engagement.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently experiencing significant revenue losses due to underperforming design elements.

problems.title: Website Bounce Rate
problems.description: High bounce rates are causing potential customers to leave your site prematurely, leading to a loss of potential sales.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent branding across platforms is weakening your market position, resulting in a loss of customer trust.

problems.title: Outdated Visuals
problems.description: Old-fashioned design elements are causing a perception of obsolescence, leading to a loss of competitive edge.

problems.title: Low Engagement
problems.description: Current design fails to capture audience interest, leading to a drop in customer interaction and a loss in potential conversions.

problems.title: Poor User Experience
problems.description: Suboptimal user interfaces are frustrating users, causing a loss of return visitors and decreased brand loyalty.

problems.title: Ineffective Marketing Materials
problems.description: Marketing materials that do not resonate with your target audience are resulting in a waste of marketing spend.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions directly address the losses outlined above.

solutions.title: Comprehensive Brand Overhaul
solutions.description: We will revitalize your brand identity to ensure consistency and appeal across all platforms. This will strengthen customer trust.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: A modern, user-friendly website designed to improve user experience and reduce bounce rates, turning visitors into customers.

solutions.title: Marketing Collateral Design
solutions.description: Creation of compelling marketing materials that resonate with your audience and maximize your marketing ROI.

solutions.title: Visual Content Strategy
solutions.description: Developing a strategic approach to visual content that engages and retains your audience, enhancing brand loyalty.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida offers unparalleled expertise in delivering impactful graphic design solutions.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Track Record
whyUsCards.description: We have successfully transformed brands across diverse industries, driving measurable results.

whyUsCards.title: Dedicated Team
whyUsCards.description: Our team of experts is committed to understanding and achieving your business goals.

whyUsCards.title: Attention to Detail
whyUsCards.description: We ensure every design element aligns with your brand vision and audience expectations.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We use cutting-edge design techniques to ensure your brand stands out in a crowded market.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our team is dedicated to bringing your brand vision to life.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads our strategy and client relationships, ensuring that each project aligns with your business goals.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We start by understanding your brand, goals, and audience.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Our team designs and develops solutions tailored to your needs.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We implement the designs across your chosen platforms.

process.title: Review & Optimization
process.description: Post-launch, we review performance and optimize where necessary.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose from our investment options to achieve your design goals.

pricing.name: Premium Package
pricing.description: Optimal for extensive and ongoing design projects.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Schedule a conversation with us to explore how we can elevate your brand.

lead.company_description: From branding to custom websites and everything in between, Shida Studio is your one-stop shop for all your graphic design needs. Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
